Waqaruddin

Learn More

Welcome to my Website. I am an Electronics and Data hobbyist, Web developer, and a third year Engineering Sciences Student at GIKI University, Pakistan. In the past I have worked on many independent projects alongside my formal education. My goal is to develop innovative solutions in the multimedia and automation industries through my combined software and hardware experience. I have advanced knowledge in Java,C++ and R, experience designing custom electronic circuits/robotics, as well as building this website using responsive web technologies from scratch. I started creating this website as an excercise two years ago and the result is what you see today.
